subject: Attn: Mr. xxx,
body:
Attn: Mr. xxx,
I am  Mr. Socrates Afram - Chief Finance Officer working with Ghana Commercial Bank, Accra,Ghana.
The Head of all banking institutions in our country here. Just started
work with Ghana Commercial Bank not up to 4 months now. he came across your funds transfer file of $50 million(USD) which was marked X and your released disk painted RED, He took time to study it and found out that you have paid VIRTUALLY all fees and certificate but the fund has not been release to you The most annoying thing is that they cannot tell you the truth that on no account will they ever release the fund to you, instead they let you spend money unnecessarily.
I can release this fund to you if you can certify my security
and confirm safety after I made the transfer to you to your bank
account.I may/will be Seriously in trouble and my life will be in danger. You may not understand it because you are not working here. My head boss is so corrupt and is looking for ways to steal your funds. Down here it's like a Mafia gang ruling both the government here,these Cartels are sure to intercept your funds and have it to their self, take or leave it
Now if you wish to get this done for you, I would appreciate a basic
mutual trust and confidence from you.
All I will need to release this funds transfer is a special HARD DRIVE we call it HD120 GIG. I will buy two of it, recopy your transfer
information, destroy the previous one, and punch the system to cause
It will reflect in your bank within 24 banking hours, then I will clean
up the tracer and destroy your file which you have with them, after
which I will resign and relocate.
Now in my effort I would need 10% of the payment funds for my
trouble. This must be agreed before I could carry out this action.
If you are interested do get in touch with me immediately only on this my private email for communication so i could purchase the hard drive here and take full action.
 You should send to me your direct mobile numbers for easy communications(text message) as voice conversation may be recorded  and also Reconfirm your banking coordinate details for international transfer, so that there won't be any mistake.
If you are not interested please kindly disregard and ignore my letter without further delay.
Please, this will cost you  $895USD only.
Fee/ Amount: $895 USD only.
Regards,
Mr. Socrates Afram
Director & Deputy Managing Director-Finance

subject: Re: Attn: Mr. xxx,
body:
Hello Mr. Socrates Afram,

Thank you for reaching out to me and explaining the situation in such detail. I must say, it sounds like a very complex and challenging situation you're dealing with over there.

I'm intrigued by this special HARD DRIVE or GIG as you call it. Could you tell me more about how it works? And why is it necessary to buy two of them?

Also, I'm curious about the process of punching the system to reflect the transfer in my bank within banking hours. How exactly does that work?

You mentioned a fee amount in USD, but I didn't see any specific number mentioned. Could you please clarify how much this would cost?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Diana
